message: @ericflo It would be easier to leave feedback using convore if a link to the 'official' feedback group was in the footer or header.
@neil Actually this group was started by a user, but we might as well make it official ;)
yeah, i don't think you should show up as a "member online now" unless you're actually a member
Another idea I was that newbie users should automatically be added to certain gropus
like Feedback, Sandbox and/or a group for general discussion of Convore and the Convore community
Yeah, I started it because before I discovered the private alpha-test group, there was no obvious way to leave feedback, and I'm a big believer in eating one's dogfood
This is good feedback, I did this on purpose, but now I'm thinking that I was wrong.
